item.title: Twitter Tips for Recruiters from the Jobfairy
item.description: So far, a whole bunch of you have read my first efforts at de-complicating the process of recruiting on twitter in my How to tweet a job vacancy post. This next post is specifically for recruiters, be they recruitment consultants, agencies or HR departments. Fairy dust incoming! Bullhorn Reach Image credit: FaceMePLS on Flickr Bullhorn Reach is a godsend for busy recruiters, sure, and a great tool.
